reviewText: A very good movie and the price was right!  Not a fan of Jennie Garth, but she was tolerable in this flick.
Title: An Unfinished Affair

reviewText: This is a thriller.  I love thrillers.  The kind that keep you on the edge of your seat to the very end.  Once again Tim Matheson is great in this role.  Watch this one with your boyfriend or hubby.  You may look at each other differently.  Ha!
Title: An Unfinished Affair

Title: An Unfinished Affair

reviewText: I've seen this movie on lifetime... I really enjoyed this film, but never saw the beginning of this movie ... It surprised me at the beginning of the credits that Jennie Garth co-produced the film. I wonder is this the only film she's co-produced or are there others ones? ... I do think she is a beautiful good actress. I wish though, that the time she was seducing the son that there would have been more scenes where she's being more manipulative whether to the son or the rest of the family before it leads to the finale. I did like the last scene but, I do think the very ending could have been a lot better.I kind of wish she would have gotten away with it all, I think that would have made the whole movie more intriguing.Nevertheless, its a movie i will watch over and over again ... If anyone enjoyed this movie then I really think ya'll will enjoy DREAM LOVER starring James Spader and Madchen Ammick ,... Very good movie with two very talented beautiful actors in this film... their performances are amazing in this film is outstanding, their chemistry is great... and Madchen is amazing at acting as the seductive, very manipulative, calculating character in the film.... This by the way is another film in which I think it would have been great  if  ** SPOILER ALERT** ... Lena (madchen's character) had not gotten away with it all .... But yet again if you see this film, you may feel way more sympathetic for (spaders character) which I did, so I also do like the way the movie ends in this dreamlike scene...
Title: An Unfinished Affair

reviewText: Wow!  Sometimes things can be blown out of proportion and bad things happen.  Very good movie!  Gotta be more careful what you like and get tempted with.
Title: An Unfinished Affair

reviewText: Jennie Garth, Tim Matheson, Leigh Taylor-Young. After the wife of a married professor goes into complete remission from cancer, he tries to break off his affair with one of his students. But she can't and refuses to accept that it's over and plots to ruin his life.
Title: An Unfinished Affair
